languages.text: "Возможно, Неумирающий послал нас, чтобы принести последний дар Его милости тем, кто выжил".
languages.translation_comment: Argenta: "The warp is a sea of evil relentlessly grasping at our souls. It is no surprise that vessels travelling through it so often meet with disaster."

languages.text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, Неумирающий послал нас, чтобы принести последний дар Его милости тем, кто выжил".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His mercy to those who survived."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His mercy to those who survived."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Vielleicht hat der Todlose uns geschickt, den Überlebenden das finale Geschenk seines Friedens zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht hat der Todlose uns geschickt, den Überlebenden das finale Geschenk seines Friedens zu bringen."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Peut-être l'Immortel nous a-t-Il envoyés ici pour offrir l'ultime présent de Sa paix éternelle à ceux qui ont survécu. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être l'Immortel nous a-t-Il envoyés ici pour offrir l'ultime présent de Sa paix éternelle à ceux qui ont survécu. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Tal vez el Inmortal nos ha enviado a conceder Su Paz a los supervivientes».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez el Inmortal nos ha enviado a conceder Su Paz a los supervivientes».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「おそらく不死の者は、生き残った者たちに平和という最後の贈り物をもたらすために、私たちを遣わされたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく不死の者は、生き残った者たちに平和という最後の贈り物をもたらすために、私たちを遣わされたのでしょう」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “或许不死之神派我们来这里，就是为了把祂最后的安息带给那些幸存的人们。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."

traits.locale_text: “或许不死之神派我们来这里，就是为了把祂最后的安息带给那些幸存的人们。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "Perhaps the Undying One has sent us to bring the final gift of His Peace to those who survived."
